S203B.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRADE?  1. PRIVATE OR PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 2. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 3. SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE 4. STAFF SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE 5. TECHNICAL SERGEANT, MASTER SERGEANT, OR 1ST SERGEANT 0. NO ANSWER

S203B.Q2. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN OVERSEAS?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 18 MONTHS 5. OVER 18 MONTHS UP TO 2 YEARS 6. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER
S203B.Q3. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY?  01. 18 YEARS 02. 19 03. 20 04. 21 05. 22 06. 23 07. 24 08. 25 09. 26-29 10. 30-34 11. 35 YEARS AND OVER 12. NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203B.Q4. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

S203B.Q5. WHAT IS THE DATE ON YOUR COPY OF "WARWEEK"*  1. DECEMBER 9, 1944 2. DECEMBER 16, 1944 3. DECEMBER 31, 1944 4. JANUARY 14, 1945 5. JANUARY 21, 1945 6. JANUARY 28, 1945 7. FEBRUARY 4, 1945 0. NO ANSWER P. THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT "WARWEEK". ("WARWEEK" IS THE 4 PAGE FEATURE SECTION WHICH HAS BEEN APPEARING ABOUT ONCE A WEEK IN "THE STARS AND STRIPES".)

S203B.Q6. DURING THE LAST FEW WEEKS, HOW OFTEN HAVE YOU READ PART OR ALL OF "WARWEEK"*  1. HAVE READ SOMETHING IN IT EVERY WEEK 2. HAVE READ SOMETHING IN IT SEVERAL TIMES 3. HAVE READ SOMETHING IN IT ONCE OR TWICE 4. HAVE NEVER READ ANYTHING IN IT 5. UNCERTAIN 0. NO ANSWER

S203B.Q7. WHEN YOU SEE A COPY OF "WARWEEK", DO YOU USUALLY LOOK AT EVERYTHING IN IT, OR DO YOU SKIP THROUGH IT AND JUST LOOK AT SOME PARTS OF IT?  1. I USUALLY SKIP THROUGH AND JUST LOOK AT SOME PARTS OF IT 2. I USUALLY LOOK AT NEARLY EVERYTHING, BUT I DON'T READ IT ALL 3. I USUALLY READ NEARLY ALL OF IT 4. I HAVEN'T SEEN "WARWEEK" ENOUGH TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S203B.Q8. DO YOU FEEL THAT THE STORIES IN "WARWEEK" ARE OF IMPORTANCE AND VALUE FOR YOUR TYPE OF OUTFIT?  1. ALMOST ALL OF THE STORIES IN "WARWEEK" ARE VALUABLE TO US 2. MOST OF THEM ARE VALUABLE TO US 3. IT'S ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 4. ONLY A FEW OF THEM ARE VALUABLE TO US 5. I DON'T READ "WARWEEK" 0. NO ANSWER

S203B.Q9. HOW INTERESTING DO YOU PERSONALLY FIND MOST OF THE THINGS YOU SEE IN "WARWEEK"*  1. MOST OF THEM ARE VERY INTERESTING TO ME 2. MOST OF THEM ARE FAIRLY INTERESTING TO ME 3. MOST OF THEM ARE NOT VERY INTERESTING TO ME 4. MOST OF THEM DO NOT INTEREST ME AT ALL 5. I HAVEN'T SEEN "WARWEEK" ENOUGH TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S203B.Q10. HOW IMPORTANT TO YOU PERSONALLY DO YOU FEEL MOST OF THE THINGS IN "WARWEEK" ARE?  1. MOST OF THEM ARE VERY IMPORTANT TO ME 2. MOST OF THEM ARE FAIRLY IMPORTANT TO ME 3. MOST OF THEM ARE NOT VERY IMPORTANT TO ME 4. MOST OF THEM ARE NOT AT ALL IMPORTANT TO ME 5. I HAVEN'T SEEN "WARWEEK" ENOUGH TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER
S203B.Q11. EVERYTHING CONSIDERED, HOW WOULD YOU RATE "WARWEEK"*  1. EXCELLENT 2. GOOD 3. FAIR 4. NOT SO GOOD 5. QUITE POOR 6. HAVEN'T READ IT ENOUGH TO SAY 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203B.Q12G. AN ARTICLE ABOUT "BUCKING THE BREAKTHROUGH"*  1. NOT SURE 2. YES 3. NO 4. NO ANSWER

S203B.Q13. HAVE YOU EVER SENT HOME ANY ISSUES OF "WARWEEK" OR PARTS OF THEM?  1. YES, I HAVE SENT SEVERAL ISSUES OF "WARWEEK" (OR CLIPPINGS) HOME 2. YES, I HAVE SENT ONE OR TWO HOME 3. NO, I HAVE NOT SENT ANY HOME 0. NO ANSWER

S203B.Q14. DO YOU REMEMBER HEARING ANY OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT TALKING ABOUT ARTICLES IN "WARWEEK" OR DISCUSSING WHAT THE ARTICLES SAID?  1. YES, I HEARD A LOT OF DISCUSSION ABOUT ARTICLES IN "WARWEEK" 2. YES, I HEARD SOME DISCUSSION ABOUT "WARWEEK" ARTICLES 3. NO, THERE WAS HARDLY ANY DISCUSSION ON "WARWEEK" ARTICLES 4. NO, I DON'T REMEMBER HEARING ANY DISCUSSION AT ALL ABOUT "WARWEEK" ARTICLES 0. NO ANSWER

S203B.Q15. CAN YOU REMEMBER READING ANY PARTICULAR ARTICLE IN "WARWEEK" THAT SEEMED ESPECIALLY INTERESTING TO YOU PERSONALLY?  1. YES, SOMETHING WRITTEN IN 2. YES, NOTHING WRITTEN IN 3. NO, I DON'T REMEMBER ANY THAT INTERESTED ME GREATLY 0. NO ANSWER
S203B.Q16. IS THERE SOME PARTICULAR THING IN "WARWEEK" YOU DISLIKE?  1. YES, SOMETHING WRITTEN IN 2. YES, NOTHING WRITTEN IN 3. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S203B.Q17A1. "GI JERRY" (CARTOONS)*  1. GETS TOO MUCH SPACE NOW 2. GETS ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF SPACE NOW 3. SHOULD GET MORE SPACE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S203B.Q17A2. "THE OLD SERGEANT'S CORNER"*  1. GETS TOO MUCH SPACE NOW 2. GETS ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF SPACE NOW 3. SHOULD GET MORE SPACE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S203B.Q17A3. ARTICLES ABOUT "COMBAT TIPS"*  1. GETS TOO MUCH SPACE NOW 2. GETS ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF SPACE NOW 3. SHOULD GET MORE SPACE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S203B.Q17A4. ARTICLES ABOUT "HOW TO TREAT GERMAN CIVILIANS"*  1. GETS TOO MUCH SPACE NOW 2. GETS ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF SPACE NOW 3. SHOULD GET MORE SPACE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S203B.Q17A5. ARTICLES ABOUT "HOW TO PREVENT FUTURE WARS"*  1. GETS TOO MUCH SPACE NOW 2. GETS ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF SPACE NOW 3. SHOULD GET MORE SPACE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S203B.Q17B. ARE THERE ANY OTHER THINGS THAT YOU THINK SHOULD GET MORE SPACE THAN THEY GET AT PRESENT IN "WARWEEK"*  1. NO, I CAN'T THINK OF ANY 2. YES, SOMETHING WRITTEN IN 3. YES, NOTHING WRITTEN IN 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203B.Q17C. HOW ABOUT PICTURES - WOULD YOU LIKE "WARWEEK" TO CARRY MORE PICTURES IF IT MEANT CUTTING DOWN ON THE AMOUNT OF READING MATTER?  1. YES, THE MORE PICTURES THE BETTER 2. YES, A FEW MORE PICTURES, BUT THERE STILL SHOULD BE PLENTY OF READING MATTER 3. NO, IT HAS ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF PICTURES NOW 4. NO, IT SHOULD HAVE FEWER PICTURES AND MORE READING MATTER 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203B.Q18A. IN YOUR OPINION, WHAT IS THE MAIN PURPOSE OF "WARWEEK"*  1. HAVEN'T ANY IDEA 2. TO FURNISH SOLDIERS WITH USEFUL AND IMPORTANT INFORMATION 3. TO TRY TO GET SOLDIERS TO BELIEVE THINGS THE ARMY WANTS THEM TO BELIEVE 4. TO FURNISH SOLDIERS WITH ENTERTAINING READING MATTER 5. SOMETHING ELSE 0. NO ANSWER

S203B.Q18B. DO YOU THINK THAT "WARWEEK" HAS ANY OTHER PURPOSE IN ADDITION TO THE ONE YOU CHECKED AS THE MAIN PURPOSE?  1. HAVEN'T ANY IDEA 2. NO 3. YES, SOMETHING WRITTEN IN 4. YES, NOTHING WRITTEN IN 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA P. THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT THE "ARMY TALKS" BOOKLETS.

S203B.Q1. DURING THE PAST FEW WEEKS HOW OFTEN HAVE YOU READ PART OR ALL OF "ARMY TALKS"*  1. HAVE READ SOMETHING IN IT EVERY WEEK 2. HAVE READ SOMETHING IN IT SEVERAL TIMES 3. HAVE READ SOMETHING IN IT ONCE OR TWICE 4. HAVE NEVER READ ANYTHING IN IT 5. UNCERTAIN 0. NO ANSWER

S203B.Q2. WHEN YOU SEE A COPY OF "ARMY TALKS", DO YOU USUALLY LOOK AT EVERYTHING IN IT, OR DO YOU SKIP THROUGH IT AND JUST LOOK AT SOME PARTS OF IT?  1. I USUALLY SKIP THROUGH AND JUST LOOK AT SOME PARTS OF IT 2. I USUALLY LOOK AT NEARLY EVERYTHING, BUT I DON'T READ IT ALL 3. I USUALLY READ NEARLY ALL OF IT 4. I HAVEN'T SEEN "ARMY TALKS" OFTEN ENOUGH TO SAY 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203B.Q3. HOW INTERESTING DO YOU PERSONALLY FIND MOST OF THE THINGS YOU SEE IN "ARMY TALKS"*  1. MOST OF THEM ARE VERY INTERESTING TO ME 2. MOST OF THEM ARE FAIRLY INTERESTING TO ME 3. MOST OF THEM ARE NOT VERY INTERESTING TO ME 4. MOST OF THEM DO NOT INTEREST ME AT ALL 5. I HAVEN'T SEEN "ARMY TALKS" OFTEN ENOUGH TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S203B.Q4. HOW IMPORTANT TO YOU PERSONALLY DO YOU FEEL MOST OF THE THINGS IN THE "ARMY TALKS" BOOKLETS ARE?  1. MOST OF THEM ARE VERY IMPORTANT TO ME 2. MOST OF THEM ARE FAIRLY IMPORTANT TO ME 3. MOST OF THEM ARE NOT VERY IMPORTANT TO ME 4. MOST OF THEM ARE NOT AT ALL IMPORTANT TO ME 5. I HAVEN'T SEEN "ARMY TALKS" OFTEN ENOUGH TO SAY 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203B.Q5. ABOUT HOW OFTEN DO YOU DISCUSS MATERIAL IN THE "ARMY TALKS" BOOKLETS WITH OTHER SOLDIERS?  1. WE VERY OFTEN TALK THEM OVER 2. WE TALK THEM OVER FAIRLY OFTEN 3. WE OCCASIONALLY TALK THEM OVER 4. WE ALMOST NEVER TALK THEM OVER 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203B.Q6. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE STYLE OR WAY IN WHICH THE MATERIAL IS PRESENTED IN THE "ARMY TALKS" BOOKLETS?  1. I FEEL IT SHOULD BE PRESENTED IN A MORE SERIOUS MANNER 2. I FEEL THE STYLE OF WRITING IS VERY GOOD AS IT IS 3. I THINK IT SHOULD BE PRESENTED IN A LESS SERIOUS (MORE INFORMAL) MANNER 4. I HAVEN'T SEEN "ARMY TALKS" OFTEN ENOUGH TO SAY 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA P. THE SPACE AVAILABLE IN "ARMY TALKS" IS STRICTLY LIMITED. IN ANSWERING THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS YOU SHOULD BEAR IN MIND THAT IF MORE SPACE IS GIVEN TO SOME THINGS, OTHERS WILL HAVE TO GET LESS SPACE THAN THEY DO NOW.

S203B.Q9. WHO DO YOU THINK SHOULD PUT OUT THE BOOKLET "ARMY TALKS"*  1. A GROUP OF TRAINED ENLISTED MEN 2. EACH ARMY, AIR FORCE OR OTHER SIMILAR MAJOR COMMAND SEPARATELY 3. THEATER HEADQUARTERS FOR THE WHOLE THEATER 4. WAR DEPARTMENT IN WASHINGTON FOR ALL THE ARMY 5. SOME OTHER IDEA 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203B.Q12A. DO YOU REMEMBER ANY "ARMY TALKS" BOOKLET YOU PARTICULARLY DISLIKED?  1. NO, NONE I DISLIKED PARTICULARLY 2. YES, SOMETHING WRITTEN IN 3. YES, NOTHING WRITTEN IN 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 12B NOT CODED.

S203B.Q13A. ARE THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT EVER CALLED TOGETHER TO HEAR A TALK OR HOLD A DISCUSSION ON THE WAR AND WHAT WILL HAPPEN AFTER THE WAR?  1. WE HAVE MEETINGS LIKE THAT ABOUT EVERY WEEK 2. WE HAVE MEETINGS LIKE THAT OCCASIONALLY 3. WE SELDOM HAVE MEETINGS LIKE THAT 4. WE NEVER HAVE MEETINGS LIKE THAT 0. NO ANSWER

S203B.Q13B. IF YOU HAVE GROUP MEETINGS LIKE THAT, ARE THE TOPICS TAKEN FROM "ARMY TALKS" BOOKLETS?  1. WE NEVER HAVE MEETINGS LIKE THAT 2. YES, THE TOPICS USUALLY ARE TAKEN FROM "ARMY TALKS" BOOKLETS 3. NO, THE TOPICS USUALLY ARE NOT TAKEN FROM "ARMY TALKS" BOOKLETS 4. DON'T KNOW WHETHER THEY ARE OR NOT 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA P. THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT A PARTICULAR COPY OF THE BOOKLET "ARMY TALKS". THE TITLE AND DATE ARE NOT AVAILABLE.
S203B.Q1. HAVE YOU READ THIS "ARMY TALKS" BEFORE?  1. NOT SURE WHETHER I READ IT OR NOT 2. YES, I READ IT 3. NO, I DID NOT READ IT 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S203B.Q2. DO YOU REMEMBER HEARING ANY OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT TALKING ABOUT THIS "ARMY TALKS" OR DISCUSSING WHAT IT SAID?  1. I HEARD A LOT OF DISCUSSION ABOUT IT 2. I HEARD SOME DISCUSSION ABOUT IT 3. THERE WAS HARDLY ANY DISCUSSION ABOUT IT 4. I DON'T REMEMBER HEARING IT DISCUSSED AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S203B.Q3A. IN GENERAL, DID YOU LIKE OR DISLIKE THIS "ARMY TALKS"*  1. I DIDN'T READ IT BEFORE 2. I LIKED IT VERY MUCH 3. I LIKED IT FAIRLY WELL 4. I DIDN'T PARTICULARLY LIKE IT OR DISLIKE IT 5. I DISLIKED IT VERY MUCH 0. NO ANSWER

S203B.Q3B. WERE THERE ANY PARTICULAR THINGS ABOUT THE WAY IT WAS PRESENTED THAT YOU LIKED?  1. I DIDN'T READ IT BEFORE 2. NO 3. YES, SOMETHING WRITTEN IN 4. YES, NOTHING WRITTEN IN 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S203B.Q3C. WERE THERE ANY PARTICULAR THINGS ABOUT THE WAY IT WAS PRESENTED THAT YOU DISLIKED?  1. I DIDN'T READ IT BEFORE 2. NO 3. YES, SOMETHING WRITTEN IN 4. YES, NOTHING WRITTEN IN 0. NO ANSWER

S203B.Q4. IN GENERAL, DO YOU AGREE OR DISAGREE WITH WHAT WAS SAID IN THIS "ARMY TALKS"*  1. I DIDN'T READ IT BEFORE 2. AGREE WITH ALL OF WHAT IS SAID 3. AGREE WITH MOST OF WHAT IS SAID 4. AGREE WITH SOME AND DISAGREE WITH SOME, ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 5. DISAGREE WITH MOST OF WHAT IS SAID 6. DISAGREE WITH ALL OF WHAT IS SAID 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 5 NOT CODED.
